title: The Waning Moon
synopsis:
After his father's death, Raymond seeks to find out more about his father's work with werewolves, much of which was completed in secrecy. So he enters the Central Laboratory and meets Kata, the werewolf his father discovered years ago. He is one of three werewolves in the entire world to have been discovered by science. But Kata is a special specimen... in order for the laboratory to get the most out of their research, all of Kata's needs must be met—including his voracious sexual appetite. Life at the lab has a long history of mixing work with pleasure, and it isn't long until the lives of everyone at the Central Laboratory becomes tangled up with one another.

(Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: The Third Perspective
synopsis:
Perpetually hiding behind a smile to survive his cruel family and stifling college life, Hyeon Kwon is drowning in anxiety and despair. It's not like he chose to be born into money, but between his father's demands to uphold the family's reputation and his classmates' constant gossiping, the only respite he has is Dowon Baek, his psychiatrist. But everything changes when the mysterious Dowon inducts Hyeon into his secret other life. Infatuated with Dowon and driven by his self-destructive instincts, Hyeon is drawn into a world of twisted desire and pleasure.

(Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: Dating My Way Up
synopsis:
Handsome, stylish, and capable, Jinah is often mistaken as the heir of the company he works in. In reality, his polished look is just that—a facade he maintains in hopes of entering elite society. It's not easy to keep up appearances, but Jinah is surely inching up the social ladder. Until, that is, a bungling subordinate nicknamed the "ticking bomb" is assigned to his team. Like Jinah, though, new team member Do-hyeon is not who he appears to be.

(Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: Her Dirty Thirty Scandal
synopsis:
A lifetime of hard work has finally paid off for Serin. She's got a nice apartment, a promotion at work, but something's missing. A piece of her that she's pushed away for so long that when it comes back, it beats faster and throbs harder than she could've ever imagined. Flings are for students and teenagers. She may be all grown up, but that doesn't mean she's ready for her first scandal.

(Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: The Girlfriend Dice
synopsis:
Many people fantasize about switching partners and embarking on wild amorous adventures, but sometimes it's easier said than done! Ju-yeong and Mina are in a somewhat "happy" relationship, but things are just bland... until a magic dice comes into play! The dice's power changes the couple's chemistry together and adds zest to their love life. Just one toss and a whole new Mina emerges! Maybe those fantasies can be fulfilled after all...

(Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: Swolemates: Toying with the Buff Newbie
synopsis:
Hyungseo Lee had only just started working at a small company that sells sex toys when he was faced with a crisis. The sex toy tester suddenly quit and there was no one to fill his position. Hyunseo was asked to take over the job, but there's one big problem—Hyunseo's still a virgin! Luckily, Hyunseo happens to know Sungho Jang, a rising star in the gay porn industry, who is willing to show him the ropes.

(Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: Sexless
synopsis:
It all started with Laurence walking around in just his underwear. That was the final straw for Chip. Sleeping in separate bedrooms is frustrating enough; he doesn't need Laurence showing him what he can't have! Chip knows Laurence used to sleep around with guys all the time. So what made him go platonic all of a sudden? To find some answers, the two seek out the best couples therapist in San Francisco. But the more they talk, the more they realize there's still a lot to learn about each other.

(Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: Narae's Fantasy
synopsis:
Sweet, adorable Narae. The girl next door that everyone loves! Except, she has just one little secret—she fantasizes about having sex with anyone and everyone! Men, women, BDSM, toys, you name it, it's in there. Nothing is off limits for Narae. Now these fantasies are starting to get out of control and affect her dating (and social) life. With help from the mysterious shamaness Nokjoo and the influential Miss Miso, Narae will find a way to make these fantasies a reality and finally get herself a boyfriend.

(Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: No Love Lost Lady
synopsis:
The daughter of a famous actress, Sungha is glamorous, confident, and beautiful. However, her relationships never last longer than one month, and most of the attention she gets is from...women? In order to get in a serious relationship with Mr. Right, she decides that she needs to prevent all women from falling in love with her. So when Sungha first sees the new transfer student, Rahee, she wants to make some things clear. "You're not already in love with me, are you?" "Don't worry. You're the kind of person I can't stand."

(Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: Screengrab
synopsis:
Welcome to Screengrab, the ultimate app for succubi to extract essence from all kinds of men! Capturing and breaking in a man has never been easier, and the view has never been this good. Take a front row seat to watch loner succubus Sola conquer a whole collection of men as she delves into their deepest, darkest desires in this steamy comic from the creator of S Flower.

(Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: Everyone's Sunbae
synopsis:
Woo-young Ahn is a young 20-year-old who wanted to have a wonderful relationship. As he wishes, he starts dating the wonderful senior he has dreamed of. But... why does his senior come out gasping for breath with a stranger every time he happens to meet him?

(Source: Lezhin Entertainment, translated)

title: Pervert Club
synopsis:
A thrilling yet flirtatious relationship between the perverted girl Lee-ni, who gets excited from the wicked stares of men, and Du-jun, who is insensitive to sexual stimulus due to his father, who is an AV director, has begun! While showing off her cleavage and exposing her underwear, Lee-ni's pride is hurt when Du-jun isn't aroused even after seeing her bare form. The end result becomes an approach through all sorts of perverted acts in an effort to encapsulate him? What will the seduction of a pervert end up tasting like?

(Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: Put a Smile On
synopsis:
For Lee Kang, the captain of the swim team, life is a constant power struggle. And whether it's in sports, or in bed—he always wins. But when Junho from the baseball team accidentally witnesses him having sex with the TA, Kang finds his unyielding new opponent. Will Junho get destroyed just like the others, or will he remain standing with a defiant look in his eyes?

(Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: The Master's Appetite
synopsis:
Captain Kyle is a man of the people. He works hard to help merchants secure fair prices and, most importantly, he hates people who value money over mankind. People just like the Roches... So, when the Roche household starts searching for a new servant, Kyle sees an oh-so-appetizing opportunity: the chance to sneak behind enemy lines and prove that the Roches are rotten to the core. But in between inter-family feuding and painfully obvious political plots, Kyle unearths a bigger mystery: the eldest son refuses to eat. Determined to get to the bottom of the Roche family's decay, Kyle takes it upon himself to solve this particular conundrum. However, it soon turns out that food might not be the only appetite that begins to stir...

(Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: Between Husband and Wife
synopsis:
Goo Jun and Sung Woo are a gay couple that have been married for 1 year. They were looking forward to a happy future but there were many more responsibilities to being a married couple than they thought. One, a student and the other, an office worker, both with different routines. (They are not accepted as married men!) Will this marriage work out?

(Source: Lezhin Entertainment, translated)

title: To. Dominant
synopsis:
Sungjin Yoon is a man born into wealth who never experienced true love. It's only after he listens to Phillip Jung play the piano that his heart starts beating. But it turns out, Phillip is a deprived, twisted child in the body of a man! The two are at each other's throats as soon as they meet...! Will these two men be able to find true love? The tale of awkward emotions exploding behind a mask called perfection.

(Source: Copin Communications)

title: Accidental Roommates
synopsis:
Taesoo was at a drinking party when he got a dare to kiss his crush Gyeol. Very embarrassing indeed! But Gyeol doesn't seem to remember...? Later, in the future, they bump into each other and end up becoming roommates! How will their college life go now?

(Source: MU)

title: A Typical Romance
synopsis:
Sung-jae is a diligent, clean-cut doctor who has lingering feelings for his first love from high school. Sung-Jae always finds Sa-in reappearing in his dreams just as his memories of him are about to fade. Then for the first time in 11 years, he shows up again in Sung-jae's life. However, Sa-in's playfulness makes it hard to tell if he also has genuine feelings for Sung-jae. Will this atypical encounter unfurl into romance?

(Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: Be My Guest
synopsis:
Ever wanted to give it all up and book a one-way ticket to paradise? Well, Yeonwoo did just that. Upon arriving in Okinawa on a sultry summer night, she's ready to kick back at her hotel with a cold beer and meet some cute guys. Ah, hang on—the hotel's burnt down. Unfazed, she decides to go for a sneaky skinny-dip and work out a plan of action! But mid-swim, she gets into trouble and is saved by a mysterious man in a helmet. She wakes up in Yururi Guesthouse, and soon decides to stay (helmet-man turning out to be a hottie may have played a part.) After all, when the scenery's as gorgeous as the staff and the guests are this, er, open-minded, who'd wanna leave?

(Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: Capture
synopsis:
To Gahee, sex is just a means to fulfill her artistic desires. She uses her camera to capture intimate moments of her sex partners, friends, and other couples. So when she meets Sungha, a cute phys ed major at her school, she wonders what he'd look like through her lens, what faces he'd make in bed. But she quickly learns Sungha is different from the guys she's used to "dating." Will he just be another photograph in her collection, or something more?

(Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: Masters of Masturbation
synopsis:
Everyone knows someone like Yoon-gi. Tall, handsome, and six-pack abs hidden under a tailored suit. But behind his horn-rimmed glasses and cultured facade, Yoon-gi hides a secret passion for sex toys. And there's nothing he likes more than to wait until everyone leaves the office so he can strip down and put his favorite one to good use. Of course, like any good secret, it's more fun when you've got someone to share it with.

(Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: Steel Under Silk
synopsis:
Yeonjo used to have it all: a highly respected family, a kind brother, and a comfortable life. Now, with his father executed for high treason, his last kin dead, and damned to a lifetime of slavery, Yeonjo has nothing to lose. All that is left is vengeance, and his chance comes when the new governor assigned to the region is none other than Hee-ryang Kwon, the man who destroyed everything Yeonjo loved. Now, Yeonjo will do everything to get his revenge...even if it means getting in bed with his greatest enemy. Hiding a blade behind his beautiful smile, like silk hiding steel, Yeonjo waits for his moment to strike. But things are not going to be so easy...

(Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: Do You Still Like Me?
synopsis:
After a bad break up with his first love, Jinwoo falls into a creative slump with his ceramic art. During this slump he meets Colton, an alpha with whom he has a history. As things get steamy, it's clear that they both have an agenda. And soon enough, the situation starts to get a whole lot more complicated. It was bound to, especially when pheromones are involved...

(Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: How to Be the Chosen One
synopsis:
Cho Sunwon finds his life boring and tedious. Sex is the only thing he isn't sick of, but it's getting a little too easy to talk any guy into bed. He wants a new life, a new world, and a new challenge...and he totally gets all of those when he's summoned into another world as the so-called god of Abroria! Awesome, right? Except, nobody seems to fall for his bedroom talk, and there's a sexy king hell-bent on exposing Sunwon as a fraud. Seducing the gorgeous men around him without blowing his cover is going to be quite the divine challenge. Can Cho Sunwon actually become the Chosen One?

(Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: Pheromone Phobia
synopsis:
Jeong-oh is a beta who lives with his alpha friend, Yeong-won. They've maintained a close friendship for years now, and everything seemed fine...until Ha-yeon, the newly hired alpha at Jeong-oh's office, brings a crucial fact to Jeong-oh's attention: Yeong-won has been secretly showering Jeong-oh with his pheromones to keep other alphas and omegas away. As the trust in their friendship cracks and reveals hidden depths underneath, Jeong-oh must navigate his rapidly changing relationship with Yeong-won—which is going to be infinitely harder with Ha-yeon entering the picture.

(Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: Come to the Orchard in the Spring
synopsis:
Teaching assistant Bom Han from art department starts dating her longtime crush and fellow teaching assistant Hae-Song Nam from a neighboring department. But she gets approached by a promising art student Yoon-Oh Lee. For some reason, Hae-Song starts to avoid Bom after they start dating while Yoo-Oh waits for her everyday, tells her he loves her everyday, and hugs her tightly and tell her to come to him everyday. The person I love, the person who loves me, and my spring orchard of flowers, alcohol and candle lights.

(Source: Lezhin Entertainment, translated)

title: Lustful Child's Play
synopsis:
Moh Yeon is filled with lewd curiosities, when she becomes fixated on the idea that she wants to imitate a porn video she saw. When she finds Doha, her childhood friend... She goes to him to make a proposition.

(Source: Copin Communications)

title: Cram School Scandal
synopsis:
Looks like Daeman's made it. He's secured a job at the most prestigious cram school in Gangnam: an academy full of the rich, the studious, and the incredibly sexy. With hot girls seducing him from all directions, he's all set to enjoy himself, but... What should he do if their advances put his cushy job at risk?!

(Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: Sextealer
synopsis:
Having lost all his savings to a female con-artist, Taeil Han prepares to commit suicide. At that point, a mysterious man appears and extends a contract that takes Taeil Han back to his past. Given this seemingly golden opportunity, Taeil is excited to rectify his past. What he didn't know was that the contract came with a very crucial stipulation...

(Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: The Girl That Got Stuck in the Wall
synopsis:
Jieun is smart and witty, but she's got a penchant for running late. Luckily, she's got a few tricks up her sleeve, like a quick shortcut to help her get to work on time. Jisoo, on the other hand, is trying to find his first corporate job while nursing old wounds. Everyday's the same boring routine, to the library and back home where he lives alone. At least, until one day when he takes a wrong turn down an alley and discovers Jieun... stuck in a wall.

(Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: Size Matters
synopsis:
Mirim may be a bartender, but she doesn't really have the ear to listen to her customers' woes... and that's why she has Hyunmi (who she pays with free drinks). Hyunmi's a professional consultant by day, and a professional wingwoman by night. She may have heard and seen it all, but she's still on the hunt for her own young, handsome man that can keep her satisfied all night long. Best if he were unemployed, too, so she can call on him whenever she needs to. It's not too much to ask for, right?

(Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: Reversal
synopsis:
Hiding his real name "Yoohan" and his past recessive "omega" trait, Hajin Lee now lives as a beta. It has become his daily life to please Jinseung, the son of J-Tech's CEO, while paying a debt and living without a family. One day, Hajin reunited with Sunghyeop, his first love in high school, at a supposed meeting place with a client. Sunghyeop, the son of a driver who lived and slept at Hajin's house in the past, became the CEO of a large company. Even after 10 years, the two are still clearly imprinted on each other's pheromones. Sunghyeop then proposes a sex partner to monopolize Hajin, who left him.

(Source: Lezhin Entertainment, translated)

title: Quit Writing, Dear Author!
synopsis:
Hee-wun is the personal assistant of his childhood friend Geon-ju, whose wealthy family took him in when he was a young boy. For years, he's been nursing a crush on his friend and boss, but Geon-ju seems to have no clue. Sounds like the stuff of BL romance, right? It turns out, Hee-wun's life actually is. The night before Hee-wun is to start an odd new job for Geon-ju, he comes across a strange BL novel where the main characters have their names. It's a funny coincidence...until it's got Hee-wun yelling, "Quit Writing, Dear Author!"

(Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: Mia's Fantastic Toys
synopsis:
The future is a vast wonderland of technological pleasures hampered by a dwindling population. Their only hope is Mia, a well-endowed time traveler with a bag of sex toys determined to save mankind!

(Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: The Body Game
synopsis:
Back on campus after his military service, Daechu Jang can't wait to get some action. However, a series of untimely events leaves him knee-deep in debt and with a tarnished reputation. All hope seems lost, but one day, he receives an invitation to the "Body Game." The rules look simple: hide a number on your body, then find the numbers of three other participants. How? By having as much sex as you can! With 30 million won on the line, will this raunchy game help Daechu get back on his feet?

(Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: Eunsuk & Jung-gu
synopsis:
Eunsuk and Jung-gu have a complicated relationship. The easiest way to describe it would be "roommates." Of course, not all roommates have sex. And most of them don't visit bathhouses together. And only a small few of them have sex at bathhouses.

(Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: Another Sequence
synopsis:
Method acting comes like breathing to Yeonwoo, as he convincingly steps in and out of different roles to keep people at bay. But while his brilliance as an actor never fails to shine through the screen, he finds there is something missing in his life. With Taehyuk—his long time sex partner—and Yubin—a fresh face in showbiz—now stepping into the scene, a dangerous new sequence begins to play out...

(Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: Love Me More
synopsis:
Tom and Jaemin are polar opposites, but are very much in love. They're in their honeymoon phase, when no problem is big enough—or rather, "hairy" enough—to burst their bubble of happiness. But when a handsome next-door neighbor enters the picture, will their love be strong enough to keep their relationship from falling apart?

(Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: Scandalous
synopsis:
Who says a woman can't be smart and sexy at the same time? But can a woman get away with cheating on two men at once? Saeeun's simply SCANDALOUS!

(Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: Scent of a Witch
synopsis:
Beyond the borders of the kingdom of Yarke, is the blighted land of Uren. Peasants and nobility listen with open ears as travelers recount tales of witchcraft under the moonlight. As tensions mount, the third prince of Yarke travels outside of his kingdom under a full moon only to encounter a beautiful woman. While the prince is charmed by her graceful appearance, she isn't all that he seems.

(Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: Still, I Like You
synopsis:
Minjae pushes Jinwoo away after five years but now ends up being suppressed by his pheromones. Another person who came to Minjae with a headache, Hyunwoo. Hyunwoo starts to shed tears at his reunion with his missing first love, Minjae, who disappeared. To make matters worse, Minjae even got a heat cycle. A story of three people that begins when everything goes awry.

(Source: Lezhin Entertainment, translated)

title: Temptress
synopsis:
Haeyo can't help herself—she gets aroused whenever, wherever. Whether she's on her way home, in the gym, or in a bar, she's ready to entice anyone who's brave enough to accept her advances. Equipped with a sultry stare, she woos unsuspecting targets who can't say no after getting a glimpse of what she has to offer. Well... Are you ready to get tempted?

(Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: Love in Kitsch
synopsis:
The Mandarin House, a kitschy B&B on Jeju island. Lured in by an ad featuring a hot guy, first-timer Yeonwoo is a bright-eyed and bushy-tailed 23 year old that has come to work here, looking for a little fun and excitement over the summer. The hot guy in the photo? Tae-hoon, your classic tsundere. Hard (body) on the outside, but you know he's got that soft, gooey interior that just needs to be coaxed out. But things aren't all soju and sun in paradise. Insatiable front desk manager, Hyun-soo, wants to get to know the newbie too. Soon, Yeonwoo is smack dab in the middle of a love triangle he had never anticipated. This is no reality show! Who will find love, who will get over the past and who will just get their rocks off this summer in Love in Kitsch?

(Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: See You Again
synopsis:
Shiwoo always used to say, "Yujin, you're my favorite person in the whole wide world." And Shiwoo always believed he was truly special to Yujin. After all, Shiwoo never really liked all those girls he dated, anyway. But when Yujin finally confesses his love, he finds himself rejected and alone... Years later, Shiwoo is a celebrity. The hard-to-manage celebrity gets a new manager that seems so familiar... her name is even Yujin... It takes but one night of too many drinks for Shiwoo to discover she isn't really what she seems.

(Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: Gold Gray
synopsis:
Fifty years go, a virus sweeps through the world, wiping out all the omegas from the face of the earth. Rain, the sole surviving omega, lives his whole life hiding his identity—until he accidentally runs into Lukas. As the chairman of the facility that used to produce artificial omegas, Lukas has to produce an alpha heir in order to succeed his father's business. And while he has his mind set on winning Rain over, things don't seem to go so smoothly...

(Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: Rent Boy
synopsis:
Anton, the heir to the Arnault family, has finally come of age. As is customary for nobles, he is given access to the Cyrene Salon, a cafe filled with pleasure...and secrecy. After just one unforgettable evening with Arwin, the parlor's "number one," the normally reserved Anton has soon become filled with lust and curiosity. Who is Arwin? How did he come to such a place? What is his connection to the head of the Arnault family? But most importantly, why can't Anton get enough of him?

(Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: The Perfect Relationship
synopsis:
Minjae is smart, handsome, and thoughtful. He wakes up early to cook Hyukjoon breakfast and gets home early enough to make him dinner. He cleans around the apartment and makes sure to take care of his adoptive father. And like any dutiful son, he wants to follow in Hyukjoon's footsteps and become a teacher. He'd make any father proud. But Hyukjoon isn't proud of Minjae. Hyukjoon's son died years ago. And the one responsible for his death lives with him. Minjae isn't Hyukjoon's son. He's his target.

(Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: Infidelity 101
synopsis:
Shihoo's life is a pretty good one. He's starting a new job at a pretty decent company, he's been happily married to a gorgeous wife for six years, and he's pretty good-looking himself. But one day, everything starts cracking at the edges when he starts to suspect that his beautiful wife Shia is having an affair. He can't stop obsessing and worrying over it, but his pretty coworker Mina might have the perfect solution: a steamy affair of his own. Shihoo isn't sure this is the right thing to do, but it's hard to say no when his wife is more suspicious than ever and there so many gorgeous women at his office. So maybe a little infidelity can't hurt...right?

(Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: Crush and Burn
synopsis:
Ken's life is ordinary. He's a former orphan, he works as a server in a pub, and he lives on the outskirts of Aman, a religious nation free from the influence of vampires. Then one day, Ken is bitten and cursed by a vampire, and is only saved from certain death by Agia Frederick, a powerful disciple of the Church. However, freeing Ken from his curse requires a physical intimacy with Agia, who seems to have ulterior motives for keeping Ken around... Will the relationship between the two men bloom into something more? Or will it be crushed and burned entirely?

(Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: Stranger
synopsis:
Jiho Kim earns a living by pickpocketing on the street. One day, he leaves the facility that he's living in after being physically assaulted by the owner. While on the street, roaming endlessly with no place to go, he sits down hopelessly in front of a car and thinks. "If I were to be hit and killed here, it'd be good if the car was expensive." With such thoughts, an expensive car stops before him, and a man in it asks, "Do you want to hop in? If you don't have anywhere to go." Jiho, who believes that even goodwill has a price, is determined and follows the man. But the man doesn't ask for anything after taking in Jiho...

(Source: Daewon C.I., translated)

title: The Only One Who Didn't Know
synopsis:
Pyo Min is your average hetero dude in college: he likes his meat, never really has any money, and he really likes girls. Until he meets Jisoo, that is. After a night of too many drinks, he realizes that not only does he have it in him to sleep with the same sex, he...really likes it. But the deeper and deeper he finds his emotions for Jisoo become...the further Jisoo pulls away... What secret is Jisoo hiding?

(Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: The Boss in the Bedroom
synopsis:
Director Goo, leader of Sales team 3 at Yeong-rong Corporation, is very adamant about keeping his personal life and his private life separate. At the office, he's a notoriously no-nonsense boss who can't stand sloppy work, especially from employees who got into the company using personal connections. When he's off the clock, he becomes Young-Jo; the college aged, regular customer at S&M lounge bar who loves being degraded and abused in the bedroom. On a night out, he hooks up with an alluring, extremely wealthy party boy who turns out to have sadistic sexual tendencies. After thoroughly enjoying a night filled with pain and pleasure, he returns to work the next day to find a nightmare situation awaiting him. Who knew the sales team 3 latest recruit would be the company CEO's son. And to make matters worse, he's the same man from the night before who had Young-jo crying out and moaning the word "hyung..."

(Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: Redemption Camp
synopsis:
Da-ae's past and present is filled with dirty little secrets. It was about time someone noticed. The only problem is Gitae, the minister's son, is not your ordinary someone. He gathers all the people that suffered from Da-ae's dirty acts and starts the road to her redemption.

(Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: Do It One More Time
synopsis:
A dissatisfied married couple is given a second chance at love and are transported back in time to the day they met. Will they get back together or find new loves?

(Source: MU)

title: Nineteen
synopsis:
A narrative comic that illustrates some of the most funniest and sexiest experiences in a way only our creator, N.ya, can.

(Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: How Far Have You Gone?
synopsis:
Looks cute and sweet? Don't judge a book by its cover. Here's a story about the intricate, private details of a newlywed's sex life. Neither his first love, first kiss, nor first experience was with me, but he was my first everything. So how far have you gone?

(Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: Tentacle Recipe
synopsis:
A man steps into a VR game room, looking for some light VR fun after a drunk night out—but the next thing he knows? He's trapped inside the game, being toyed by huge demonic tentacles! His captors, the crafty devil duo, pay no attention to his cries for help as they scout for their next target to be trapped in the cycle of endless agony and pleasure.

(Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: The Ghost's Nocturne
synopsis:
As the son of King Yeom-ra of the underworld, Jae-shin has lived a hedonistic life full of ever-changing bed partners and condescension towards humans. One day, however, he crosses a line and is given a rather unusual punishment: by day, he becomes a powerless puppy, and by night, he becomes a human. The only way to escape his punishment is to win over a human's heart, which won't be easy...especially when the human he sets his eyes on is sweet-natured prince Lee Nok. Will Jae-shin win over the prince? Or will Jae-shin be the one who is won over?

(Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: Dolphin Fairy
synopsis:
Unemployed and depressed, Mokhwa decides to commit suicide by drowning. But first he must sign up for swimming lessons to use the pool. Just when he jumps in the water and lets his body sink...he is saved by his swimming teacher, Changgyeong. Mokhwa eventually begins falling for Changgyeong, a handsome man with a great body and amazing skills in bed. But the closer he gets, he can't help but feel there's something a little strange about his teacher...

(Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: Sex Toy Try-Outs
synopsis:
The spark is slowly fading from Sanghyun and Sunhee's relationship, and they don't know what to do. Luckily for them, the answer to all their problems is right in front of them—in the sex toy shop Sunhee's been working at! Despite being a loyal employee, Sunhee's never used any of the products herself. But, desperate needs call for desperate measures. Will the two manage to salvage their relationship? Let the sex toy try-outs begin!

(Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: Campus Love
synopsis:
After a humiliating breakup, Kibum suffers from recurring nightmares of his cheating ex. But a new school year always comes with the added anticipation of romance, and Kibum is more than determined to spice up his love life once again!

(Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: Midnight Men
synopsis:
Jung-hae has always wanted to live an ordinary life. But it's hard to pay the bills when you're deep in debt and barely scraping by working an honest, average job. One day, Jung-hae discovers that his brother is bringing in big bucks and suspects something dirty is going on, so he tails his brother...to a strip club full of male strippers?! When Jung-hae storms in to drag his brother out of the changing room, he has no idea that he's about to get a hell of a new job that's far from ordinary...and that the club's charismatic number one stripper, Yoo-gon, is going to change his life.

(Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: Double Trap
synopsis:
Jinsung has always had a crush on his next door neighbor, Yura, ever since they were kids. Due to unforeseen circumstances, they had to move in together and they practically became brothers. Jinsung eventually gave up the thought of ever becoming Yura's lover because Yura would draw a line in the sand each time he tried to reveal his feelings. But one night, Yura's behavior begins to change. He seems to be turning into a different person in the evening...someone with an insatiable lust for the physical... Jinsung has to admit, a side of him does enjoy his feelings being reciprocated, but this feels wrong and unsustainable. What's gotten into Yura and is there something more sinister at play...?

(Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: Snowman
synopsis:
Gi-woo has always been a merciless go-getter. He was a top student in school, and now he's playing all his cards right at work. He gets the ladies, too, of course, and though his marriage is loveless, you can't tell from the outside. One day, he receives news that an old professor of his, a father figure, has passed away. Gi-woo rushes to the funeral and meets the beautiful widow and her gorgeous daughter for the first time in years. Soon enough, desires old and new begin to snowball beyond control...

(Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: Kick Off
synopsis:
Expensive shoes, a nice watch. Smoldering good-looks. That's the new guy, Jaeha Doh, appointed to lead a new team in the company. Tae-eun is a third-year copywriter who's vying to join this new group to move his career forward. Jaeha seems a bit strict but if he's achieved this position already at his age, he must be competent, right? But something suddenly dawns on Tae-eun... This Jaeha...is this the same Jaeha he went to school with, his first crush?! Second chances at love don't come around very often. But they were just kids when they first met, surely things are different now. Still, this guy is confident, hot and seems interested, why not make the most of this opportunity? But office romances are always complicated and there's a new air about Jaeha that feels just a little off... Love and lust ensue but things aren't quite as they seem...

(Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: The Seagull and the Hunter
synopsis:
Taeyoung and Ami, young lovers from a peaceful lakeside town, grew up sharing dreams of fame and freedom. Taeyoung, son of actress Haedo Im, yearns to capture beauty from behind the camera, while Ami aspires to dazzle in front of it. But when Haedo's film director boyfriend comes to town hunting for his next leading lady, the couple's tranquility is shattered forever...

(Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: Yona and Chang-il
synopsis:
Yona's been dreaming of this day for seven years. It's his 18th birthday and he can finally sleep with Chang-il Park. What's with the age restriction, you ask? Well, Chang-il is a neighborhood prostitute that Yona's been following around like a puppy for years, just waiting for this moment. But one look at Yona's oddly big junk, and Chang-il has decided he needs to charge double for this little pervert. Will Yona, who has a thing for bad boys, finally be able to seal the deal? And will Chang-il treat this as just another business transaction or can Yona actually win him over...?

(Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: It's Just a Dream... Right?!
synopsis:
Jungoh was just expecting to take on a part-time job as an assistant. What he didn't expect was working inside people's dreams with a cute, but grumpy shaman named Ibeom. And he certainly didn't expect Ibeom to be cursed by a nightmare seedling, with uncontrollable sexual arousal that can only be tamed by acting out his desires! Ibeom may not be too sure about Jungoh, but with his prickly personality, he has no one to turn to for help. But luckily for him, Jungoh is always in a giving mood...

(Source: Tapas Media)

title: Hands Up, You're Mine
synopsis:
Juhyeon, a divorcee for 20 years, wants to spend Christmas Eve with her daughter who is now an adult, but she refuses. After that, even her colleagues refuse to spend it with her. In an impulse, she ends up drinking outside the convenience store by her house. Then, by chance, she runs into her daughter's friend from high school, Shiwoo, and mindlessly invites him to her house. Is that a risky decision...?

"I can tell what you truly want even if you try to hide it. That means you can just leave it to me."

Is it really... alright to do this... with him...?

An adult woman's passionate desire that cannot be concealed!

(Source: Lezhin Entertainment, translated)

title: Booty Camp
synopsis:
Ever find the one that got away? Harim and Eunju are old high school classmates who never got to fulfill their desires of being with each other. After graduating, they went their separate ways. But one day, they bump into each other and old flames get rekindled. Things are about to get hot and heavy, but there's just one thing. This stud has prioritized athletics above all else, meaning Eunju will have to show him the ropes in bed. Will they experience the ultimate high-intensity bedroom "booty camp" or will Harim's obsession with fitness get in the way of everything?

(Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: My Last Love Scenario
synopsis:
College is a time of freedom, learning, and, let's be honest, sex. Juhyun and Jigoo spent most of their high school years studying and keeping their relationship a secret from everyone in their lives. But now, they've moved out which means no curfew, no rules, and no roommates. But they're about to learn that taking their relationship to the next level means taking on some new challenges, too.

(Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: A Fine Line
synopsis:
Guys like Woojin have it all: the looks, personality, and background to be popular. There's no way Woojin would take interest in a nobody like Yunwoo, but Yunwoo ends up falling for Woojin and telling him how he feels. To Yunwoo's surprise, Woojin responds to the outburst with a risky suggestion of his own. Yunwoo can't seem to say no to Woojin, but how long can they last?

(Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: Maybe Mine
synopsis:
What are the chances of finding love through a dating app? The shy and inexperienced Hyunsoo definitely doesn't have the answer to that question, or to her nonexistent love life. But after hiding her sexual orientation for years, she decides to give the lesbian dating app, "Maybe," a shot. There, she meets the drop-dead gorgeous Sijin, who whisks her away for an enchanting night together. One night quickly becomes two, and soon they find themselves developing feelings they'd never expected. However, the more they learn about one another, the more they find their past wounds and insecurities returning to haunt them and their relationship. Perhaps what Sijin and Hyunsoo have will be a passing fling, or maybe... it could be the start of something special.

(Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: Tempters
synopsis:
For Haesoo, the idea of a demanding, sexually aggressive "queen" has always felt more appealing than being "king" himself. But when he thinks he's finally met someone who can turn that dream into reality, he discovers that it's not a woman who's waiting to dominate him but another guy... Is this the sexual fantasy that Haesoo has always been after? Can Haesoo handle being pushed far beyond his limits?

(Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: Farming for Love
synopsis:
Hyeon-woo Lee's had a parade of terrible ex-boyfriends, with his most recent ex dumping him in favor of a marriage to advance his career. Tired of his wretched love life and in need of some space, Hyeon-woo moves out of the city to the countryside. He's only planning to stay there for a while until he's recovered from his broken heart, but then he meets stoic farmer boy Do-won Kim. Hyeon-woo doesn't mean to get mixed up with Do-won, especially when he knows it won't last, but things rarely ever go his way...

(Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: The Virgin Witch
synopsis:
30-year-old virgin Mihye is burning up with lust, but the only company she has on her 30th birthday is wine, cake, and a life-sized pillow of her favorite idol singer. Well, a girl's gotta drink up and dream big. She blows out the candles with just one wish for her coming year...to finally pop that cherry. When she opens her eyes, lo and behold, a handsome hunk has materialized out of thin air. And he's got an irresistible offer for her: become a witch, and take him has her familiar. One thing's for sure... This witch will be riding more than broomsticks.

(Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: Punch Drunk Love
synopsis:
Seon-woo has an ordinary life with an okay job in an okay company. There's only one thing that really stands out about him: he's starving for rough sex. Honestly, is it too much to ask for a handsome man to tie him up and use him?! Lack of hardcore romps aside, Seon-woo is happy enough to keep this routine forever...but that all changes when the jaw-droppingly handsome Tae-moon joins the company. Sneaking glances at Tae-moon becomes Seon-woo's new favorite activity, until one such glance uncovers a secret—their sexual preferences seem to line up! It's everything Seon-woo could have asked for, so now he needs to know...would Tae-moon please rail him just this once?

(Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: Odd Love
synopsis:
On the outside, Jaehan Jeong has it all. He's a third-generation chaebol in charge of an incredibly successful film production company. Despite all the power and money, he's been secretly suffering from a torturous ailment. After years of drugs and alcohol abuse, he's lost the ability to orgasm—or so he thought. When someone from his past unexpectedly shows up, Jaehan experiences pleasure that he thought he'd lost forever...

(Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: Girlfriend for Hire
synopsis:
They say unhealthy attachments are the root of most problems. Luna Kim knows this because she's attached to many things—her toxic ex-boyfriend, her kind but unavailable psychiatrist, and most of all, her opulent lifestyle that she lost after her family went into debt. So when she meets Sung-hyun Moon while working as a girlfriend-for-hire, it's no surprise that another unhealthy relationship begins between them... except this one may have deeply troubling consequences. Not only does Sung-hyun live in the very apartment Luna was kicked out of, but unbeknownst to them, there's something more sinister connecting their two families. Despite this, Luna's feelings for Sung-hyun grow increasingly sincere. Will Luna be able to stop her unhealthy habits and find genuine love with Sung-hyun, or will she become enmeshed in something much more poisonous?

(Source: Tappytoon)

title: Did It Work
synopsis:
Seungjeong inherited the abilities of his ancestors, who were famous shamans, but those abilities can only be used when they get pleasure from sexual contact with the right person. Seungjeong, who went to the casino because of a friend's trick, lost all of his fortune and was looking around to use his ancestor's abilities. Seungjeong, who found Gayoon, followed him and forcibly rubbed his body to get pleasure. After winning money at the casino, he was able to return to Seoul safely. Afterwards, he reunited with Gayoon at the club where he was playing with his friend, and after being struck in the head and passed out, he woke up and found himself buried in the ground.

(Source: Lezhin Entertainment, translated)

title: Man Crush
synopsis:
With a racing heart, Jinho makes his way to Room 609, where Yunsoo is waiting for him. Yunsoo, the dreamy, blond, green-eyed stud he's had a crush on since forever. If he's lucky, he'll get to kiss him. If he's really lucky, he'll get to blow him. And one day, he'll get to go all the way... Deep down, Jinho knows being secret f-buddies isn't what he truly wants. But what can he do to turn a crush into something more?

(Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: A Tree Without Roots
synopsis:
Hee-seo, who lost his only family member, his mother, in an accident when he was young, is now raised by his adoptive parents and is curious about who his secret sponsor is. The night when he was hospitalized for causing an arson, he meets the person he has been looking for so much...

(Source: Lezhin Entertainment, translated)

title: Crossing the Line
synopsis:
I was caught masturbating with a dildo in my homophobic roommate's bed! A breathtaking campus battle romance between Jae-hyuk, an arrogant but unlucky homophobe, and Ga-ram, who has a cute appearance!

(Source: Lezhin Entertainment, translated)

title: My Special Squishy Someone
synopsis:
After losing all hope of finding love, Ha-eun doesn't see the point of carrying on...until one day, a mysterious being saves her life and promises to make her irresistible to any man. Its method is unorthodox to say the least, but it sure makes her feel good.

(Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: The Path to Vengeance
synopsis:
A person who has wealth, a person with high social status... A child born with his father's golden spoon that denoted all those words. That person was my older brother. Although I was an orphan that was adopted out of amusement and curiosity, I was grateful that they chose me. Until father died...

(Source: Lezhin Entertainment, translated)

title: The Girl That Wet the Wall
synopsis:
Life is good (if not a bit boring) for Jun-kyu, who works as a part-time receptionist at a local youth center. One day, a young personal trainer joins the gym... only she's the girl who took his virginity 6 years ago!

(Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: The Girl That Lingers in the Wall
synopsis:
After losing all his savings in a rental scam, Sulki miraculously finds a brand new apartment at a price too good to be true. Little does he know the place is haunted by a ghost who's hell bent on sucking out his energy—whether it be by playing tricks on him with dirty dreams or possessing other people in his life.

(Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: In the Castle: The Dragon's Erotic Education
synopsis:
When one's life mission is to provide a mighty dragon with the sex education he deserves, one needs to really commit. Even if it means you have to spend the majority of your life alone in a castle with nothing but an egg for company. While some might find this solitary lifestyle daunting, Litz is fine. More than fine. He's found a way to combat loneliness: by pouring his heart and soul into fathering(?) 1,697 sex toys. The day the dragon finally emerges from the egg will be the day that Litz's babies will finally unleash their true potential...but can Litz bear to wait?

(Source: Lezhin Entertainment)
